1.question: What can we do for you?
answers: We will build cover letters and resumes that will result in interviews
We will coach you to an interview performance that will impress employers
We will coach you on how to negotiate

2.question: How does it work?
answers: We will help you identify and describe your achievements in both your documents and your interview answers
Your achievements will prove that you have the skills that employers are seeking

3.question: Why choose us?
answers: We have successfully helped clients across Canada and throughout the United States including Silicon Valley
Our services can take you anywhere in the world

4.question: Can I use the services online from remote locations?
answers: We are prepared to word with you electronically no matter where you are
Technology will allow us to personalize the service anywhere

5.question: Do you offer Career Transition/Outplacement service?
answers: We have successfully assisted companies to respectfully downsize their staff
Our out placement packages include out full range of services

6.question: What career is right for me?
answers: We eliminate the confusion about your career direction by using formal tools that clarify your ideal career path
